<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:M208_5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>M208_5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Mathematical language</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematische Sprache</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage mathématique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua matemática</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua matematica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματική γλώσσα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lenguaje matemático</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">In our everyday lives we use we use language to develop ideas and to communicate them to other people. In this unit we examine ways in which language is adapted to express mathematical ideas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">functions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">sets</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In unseren täglichen Lebensdauern, die wir uns 
verwenden, verwenden Sie Sprache, um Ideen zu entwickeln und sie zu 
den Leuten mitzuteilen. In dieser Maßeinheit überprüfen wir 
Methoden, in denen Sprache angepaßt wird, um mathematische Ideen 
auszudrücken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans nos vies journalières que nous nous 
utilisons employez le langage pour développer des idées et pour les 
communiquer à d'autres. Dans cette unité nous examinons les 
voies en lesquelles le langage est adapté pour exprimer des idées 
mathématiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em nossas vidas onde diárias nós nos usamos use
a língua desenvolver idéias e comunicá-las aos povos. Nesta 
unidade nós examinamos as maneiras em que a língua é adaptada para 
expressar idéias matemáticas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nelle nostre vite che giornalieri li usiamo usi 
il linguaggio per sviluppare le idee e per comunicarlo alla gente. 
In questa unità esaminiamo i modi in cui il linguaggio è 
adattato per esprimere le idee matematiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στις καθημερινές ζωές μας που χρησιμοποιούμε εμείς 
χρησιμοποιήστε τη γλώσσα για να αναπτύξετε τις ιδέες και για να 
τις διαβιβάσετε σε άλλους ανθρώπους. Σε αυτήν την μονάδα 
εξετάζουμε τους τρόπους στους οποίους η γλώσσα προσαρμόζεται στις
σαφείς μαθηματικές ιδέες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En nuestras vidas diarias que nos utilizamos 
utilice el lenguaje para desarrollar ideas y para comunicarlas a la 
gente. En esta unidad examinamos las maneras en las cuales el 
lenguaje se adapta para expresar ideas matemáticas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktionen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fonctions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">positionnements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">funções</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">funzioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">insiemi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λειτουργίες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύνολα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">funciones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conjuntos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
